verses.text: I vowed \w to|strong="H1732"\w* watch \w my|strong="H1732"\w* words, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* sin \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* tongue, but \w to|strong="H1732"\w* put \w on|strong="H5329"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* mouth \w a|strong="H3068"\w* muzzle, while \w the|strong="H1732"\w* wicked \w were|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* presence.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* \w silent|strong="H6310"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* dumb, speechless: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* pain \w was|strong="H6310"\w* stirred \w up|strong="H5704"\w*.

My heart \w grew|strong="H5916"\w* hot within me; as I mused, \w the|strong="H2896"\w* fire \w was|strong="H3511"\w* kindled, till \w at|strong="H2896"\w* last \w the|strong="H2896"\w* \w words|strong="H2896"\w* came \w to|strong="H2896"\w* my tongue.

“Teach \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w my|strong="H1696"\w* end, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* sum \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* days \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w*. Let \w me|strong="H1696"\w* know how transient \w I|strong="H3820"\w* am.

\w See|strong="H3045"\w*! \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w but|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* span, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w nothing|strong="H4100"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath \w that|strong="H3045"\w* everyone stands: \qs Selah\qs*

\w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w mere|strong="H1892"\w* semblance \w we|strong="H3068"\w* walk \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* fro, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* noise \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w*. \w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w heap|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w know|strong="H5048"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* gather.”

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w now|strong="H1980"\w*, \w what|strong="H4310"\w* wait \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H3045"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*? \w My|strong="H3045"\w* hope \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.
From all \w my|strong="H6258"\w* transgressions deliver \w me|strong="H4100"\w*; make \w me|strong="H4100"\w* not \w the|strong="H6258"\w* scorn \w of|strong="H8431"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* fool.
\w I|strong="H7760"\w* am dumb, never opening \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* own doing.

\w Remove|strong="H6605"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* stroke \w from|strong="H6213"\w* \w off|strong="H6605"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*: \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* might \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* hand \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am spent.

\w When|strong="H3615"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* rebuke someone \w to|strong="H5921"\w* punish \w their|strong="H5921"\w* sins, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w consume|strong="H3615"\w*, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moth, \w what|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* treasures. Everyone \w is|strong="H3027"\w* only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath. \qs Selah\qs*

Hear \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*; attend \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cry \w for|strong="H5921"\w* help. Hold not \w your|strong="H3605"\w* peace \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tears. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guest \w of|strong="H5921"\w* yours, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger visiting, \w like|strong="H6211"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* ancestors.

\w Look|strong="H3068"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, let \w me|strong="H5973"\w* smile again, \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* die \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3068"\w*.
